content: NHS Digital will be holding a Connectathon for some of their FHIR based APIs on 14th March. More details at : http://web.ict.hscic.gov.uk/hscicgovuk-amnje/pages/aab671727b02e811812e70106fa6f451.html

If you're interested, I've been developing a connectathon management app (codenamed Conman) you might want to think about using... Needs work, but I intend to do that anyway... see http://snapp.clinfhir.com:4000/ . for the one we just held in New Orleans...
Thanks David - I'll take a look. It seems to be blocked by our corporate firewall for some reason, will investigate
Might be the different port.... (I have a number of services on that server)...
@David Hay That looks really nice. We've got some connectathons coming up in Aus - what is the availability?
@Michael Lawley - no worries - just let me know when. I'm working on updates to better support configuration of the tracks & scenarios, plus user login but pretty close now. What dates?
April I believe. Do you stand up a separate server for each one?
Nope - at the moment it's just a different instance of the app on a different server - but I'm working on an upgrade that I'd like to test out. I'll set it up for you: what shall I call the event?
